question: 辛抱
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>spicy</kanji> <kanji>hug</kanji> is a hug that feels not so great. But, it's not really painful all at once, either. As you're receiving a spicy hug, you just have to show <vocabulary>patience</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>endurance</vocabulary> while it lasts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You didn't learn the reading of <ja>抱</ja>'s on'yomi reading, so think about how much patience and endurance you need to learn how to be good at <reading>bo</reading>wling (<ja>ぼう</ja>).
